title: राज्य सभा सांसद सुभाष चंद्रा गोयनका के देश छोड़कर जाने की ख़बरें झूठी हैं
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim:
I was surprised this morning to witness the rains in Mumbai so late September. Climate change else the rains normally stop in 1st week September in Mumbai — Subhash Chandra (@subhashchandra) September 27, 2019

Wish you all very happy NAVRATRI celebration. I am going to Dr. Rashmikant Patel’s clinic in Mumbai for my eye surgery, will be back by 2PM — Subhash Chandra (@subhashchandra) September 29, 2019

My Sambabdhi Pawan Jain was one of many to visit my Mumbai residence for giving wishes for my eye surgery. Thanks to all visitors pic.twitter.com/3kM2CXEFn4 — Subhash Chandra (@subhashchandra) September 29, 2019

It has been brought to my notice that certain mischief makers have insinuated that my father and our Chairman Shri @SubhashChandra has left the country. Vide this tweet, I wish to clarify straightaway, that He is very much in Mumbai at home. (1/2) — Punit Goenka (@punitgoenka) September 29, 2019

He is a fighter and a patriot, and certainly not one to run away from challenges.

My message to the ones who attempted this, focus on positive things in life!! (2/2) — Punit Goenka (@punitgoenka) September 29, 2019
